problem_text: For trapezoid Q R S T, M and P are midpoints of the legs. If P M = 2 x, Q R = 3 x, and T S = 10, find P M.
compact_text: For trapezoid QRST, M and P are midpoints of the legs. If PM = 2x, QR = 3x, and TS = 10, find PM.
annotat_text: For trapezoid QRST, M and P are midpoints of the legs. If PM = 2x, QR = 3x, and TS = 10, find PM.
